item.title: Lab
item.description: I’ve got a home lab where I’m configuring a pseudo-enterprise environment, complete with virtualized bastion servers. Cisco Lab: 3x 1841 Routers 1x Catalyst WS-2960-8TC-L 1x Catalyst WS-2960g-8TC-L 1x Catalyst 3550 48-port Layer3 Switch 1x Aironet 1601e WAP This is my lab environment for my CCNA exams. Computers Almost everything in my lab runs CentOS 7. My tricked out x220 is running Fedora 28. Bare metal hosts: A three-node Proxmox VE cluster running a GlusterFS cluster for high availability.
